entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
